bit_field_value.name: HWGENERAL_SM_0b00
bit_field_value.description: No Serial Engine, always use parallel signaling.

bit_field_value.name: HWTXBUF_TXLC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Store device transmit contexts in the TX FIFO

bit_field_value.name: HWTXBUF_TXLC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Store device transmit contexts in a register file

register.name: GPTIMER0LD
register.description: General Purpose Timer n Load Register

bit_field.name: GPTLD
bit_field.description: Specifies the value to be loaded into the countdown timer on a reset. The value in this register represents the time in microseconds minus 1 for the timer duration. For example, for a one millisecond timer, load 1000 - 1 = 999 (0x00_03E7). Maximum value is 0xFF_FFFF or 16.777215 seconds.

register.name: GPTIMER0CTL
register.description: General Purpose Timer n Control Register

register.name: GPTIMER1LD
register.description: General Purpose Timer n Load Register

bit_field.name: GPTLD
bit_field.description: Specifies the value to be loaded into the countdown timer on a reset. The value in this register represents the time in microseconds minus 1 for the timer duration. For example, for a one millisecond timer, load 1000 - 1 = 999 (0x00_03E7). Maximum value is 0xFF_FFFF or 16.777215 seconds.

register.name: GPTIMER1CTL
register.description: General Purpose Timer n Control Register

bit_field_value.name: USB_SBUSCFG_BURSTMODE_0b001
bit_field_value.description: INCR4, non-multiple transfers of INCR4 is decomposed into singles.

bit_field_value.name: USB_SBUSCFG_BURSTMODE_0b010
bit_field_value.description: INCR8, non-multiple transfers of INCR8, is decomposed into INCR4 or singles.

bit_field_value.name: USB_SBUSCFG_BURSTMODE_0b011
bit_field_value.description: INCR16, non-multiple transfers of INCR16, is decomposed into INCR8, INCR4 or singles.

bit_field_value.name: USB_SBUSCFG_BURSTMODE_0b101
bit_field_value.description: INCR4, non-multiple transfers of INCR4 is decomposed into smaller unspecified length bursts.

bit_field_value.name: USB_SBUSCFG_BURSTMODE_0b110
bit_field_value.description: INCR8, non-multiple transfers of INCR8 is decomposed into smaller unspecified length bursts.

bit_field_value.name: USB_SBUSCFG_BURSTMODE_0b111
bit_field_value.description: INCR16, non-multiple transfers of INCR16 is decomposed into smaller unspecified length bursts.

register.name: HCIVERSION
register.description: Host Controller Interface Version and Capability Registers Length Register

bit_field_value.name: HCSPARAMS_PI_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The port status and control registers include a R/W field for controlling the state of the port indicator

bit_field_value.name: HCCPARAMS_IST_0b0000
bit_field_value.description: The value of the least significant 3 bits indicates the number of microframes a host controller can hold a set of isochronous data structures (one or more) before flushing the state

bit_field_value.name: USBCMD_FS_0b00
bit_field_value.description: When FS2 = 0, the size is 1024 elements (4096 bytes). When FS2 = 1, the size is 64 elements (256 bytes).

bit_field_value.name: USBCMD_FS_0b01
bit_field_value.description: When FS2 = 0, the size is 512 elements (2048 bytes). When FS2 = 1, the size is 32 elements (128 bytes).

bit_field_value.name: USBCMD_FS_0b10
bit_field_value.description: When FS2 = 0, the size is 256 elements (1024 bytes). When FS2 = 1, the size is 16 elements (64 bytes).

bit_field_value.name: USBCMD_FS_0b11
bit_field_value.description: When FS2 = 0, the size is 128 elements (512 bytes). When FS2 = 1, the size is 8 elements (32 bytes).

bit_field_value.name: USBCMD_PSE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Use the PERIODICLISTBASE register to access the periodic schedule.

bit_field_value.name: USBCMD_ASE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Use the ASYNCLISTADDR register to access asynchronous schedule.

register.name: PERIODICLISTBASE
register.description: Periodic Frame List Base Address Register

bit_field_value.name: DEVICEADDR_USBADRA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: When this bit is written to a 1 at the same time or before USBADR is written, the write to the USBADR field is staged and held in a hidden register. After an IN occurs on endpoint 0 and is ACKed, USBADR is loaded from the holding register.

register.name: BURSTSIZE
register.description: Master Interface Data Burst Size Register

bit_field_value.name: PORTSC1_CCS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No device present (host mode) or attached (device mode)

bit_field_value.name: PORTSC1_CCS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Device is present (host mode) or attached (device mode)

bit_field_value.name: PORTSC1_PFSC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Allow the port to identify itself as high speed

bit_field_value.name: PORTSC1_PFSC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Force the port to only connect at full speed

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_HAAR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable automatic reset after connect on host port.

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_DP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The pull-up on DP is not asserted

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_DP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The pull-up on DP is asserted for data pulsing during SRP

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_IDPU_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disable pull-up. ID input not sampled.

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_HABA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable automatic B-disconnect to A-connect sequence.

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_AVV_0b0
bit_field_value.description: VBus is below A VBus valid threshold

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_AVV_0b1
bit_field_value.description: VBus is above A VBus valid threshold

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_ASV_0b0
bit_field_value.description: VBus is below A session valid threshold

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_ASV_0b1
bit_field_value.description: VBus is above A session valid threshold

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_BSV_0b0
bit_field_value.description: VBus is below B session valid threshold

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_BSV_0b1
bit_field_value.description: VBus is above B session valid threshold

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_BSE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: VBus is above B session end threshold

bit_field_value.name: OTGSC_BSE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: VBus is below B session end threshold

bit_field_value.name: USBMODE_ES_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Little endian. First byte referenced in least significant byte of 32-bit word.

bit_field_value.name: USBMODE_ES_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Big endian. First byte referenced in most significant byte of 32-bit word.
